about_the_game:
(Re)discover Wild Dose's Original Prologue in a remastered version and support the development of the main game!

The future, tomorrow...

Earth has become a giant city, private corporations have replaced governments and public services. To escape from this urban hell, people seek refuge in legal cyberdrugs, delivered directly from networks to their neural implants. Hackers also deal illegal versions of these drugs. The deadliest one is called Wild Dose.

You are one of these many cyberjunkies. Walk the slums of Eleftheria, discover the stories of its citizens, follow the rules or rebel against the system. Fulfill private contracts or execute tasks for your fellow citizens to buy your next dose.

Get away in a comforting digital environment. Let your AI Nora guide you and choose to build a strong relationship with her. Or explore Wild Dose with the Capetian, the mysterious creator of that drug. He will teach you how to survive in this dangerous rule-changing universe.

Evolve in virtual landscapes while the real world seems less tangible, until the distinction between the two becomes blurred.

In this divided society from which you are trying to escape, you will have only one certainty: taking part in Wild Dose is taking part in a revolution...

KEY FEATURES

Wild-Dose blends roleplay, psychological horror elements, and narrative exploration:
  • (Re)discover Wild Dose's Original Prologue in a remastered version
  • Unlock DLC-exclusive achievements
  • Explore four universes with varied atmospheres and game mechanics
  • Rely on a roleplay-oriented dialogue system to build your own adventure
  • Enjoy an immersive original soundtrack by Kevin Colombin

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of drug or alcohol abuse.
Physical violence - use of knives, guns and other weapons. Blood and bodily disfigurement. Suggestive themes.
